/usr/local/cuda-13.0/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --generate-code=arch=compute_86,code=[sm_86] --generate-code=arch=compute_86,code=[compute_86] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/cuda-raytracer.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cuda-raytracer.dir/kernels.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/cuda-raytracer.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda-13.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-13.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib   -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
